definition: an illegal pitch in which a foreign substance, such as spit or Vaseline, is applied to the ball by the pitcher before throwing
details:
noun
- an illegal pitch in which a foreign substance, such as spit or Vaseline, is applied to the ball by the pitcher before throwing
= example: an illegal pitch in which a foreign substance, such as spit or Vaseline, is applied to the ball by the pitcher before throwing
= synonyms: spitter
- a projectile made by chewing a piece of paper and shaping it into a sphere
